DOC.brief_title: Compliance Clinical Pathways Elective Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy : Evaluation Different Implementation Methods
DOC.detailed_description: Data patient undergo elective cholecystectomy symptomatic cholecystolithiasis collect two different period : clinical pathway form paper base check-list ( check-list group , n=118 , form clinical pathway integrate paper base medical treatment nursing documentation ( integrated clinical pathway group , n=123 . A standardized clinical pathway elective laparoscopic cholecystectomy form check list initially establish 2008 evaluated 6-month period ( August 2011 January 2012 ) University Tuebingen . The integrated clinical pathway evaluate 6-month period introduction phase 2 month ( November 2012 April 2013 ) . The content clinical pathway identical , especially concern standardization perioperative fluid management , perioperative monitoring , nutrition , analgesia , reserve medication , preoperative postoperative examination , detailed laboratory blood testing , nursing standard plan discharge . Primary outcome measure compliance clinical pathway define adherence 80 % presetted pathway item .
